title: Trading T206 in your favor (all sold)
author: PEEK enterprises

posts.post_title: Trading T206 in your favor (all sold)
posts.post_content:
I have the following cards which have been well loved.  I'm looking for upgrades to my set that are not so well loved (close to VG).  I will trade (2) of these for every (1) and maybe more depending on who you have and how nice:

Available:

Atz
Bush
Congalton (pinhole)
Fienne - Portrait
Lattimore (pinhole)
McIntyre Detroit
Schmidt
Seymour throwing
Weimer
Wiltse portrait

Need:

Barbeau
Crandall w/ Cap
Criss
Donlan Batting
Dunn
Gibson
Jones - St Louis
Leifeld - Pittsburgh
McIntyre Brooklyn & Chicago
Raymond
Rucker - pitching
Shaw
Seymour Portrait
Sullivan - Chicago
White - pitching
Wiltse - pitching

Please send any trade offers and pics to (ppgustafson@yahoo.com)
